content.title: Adding Edit Recipient Feature
content.body:
Let’s get started!

In this hike, you will learn how to:

  • Generate a screen for editing recipient details
  • Design the UI for the Edit Recipient form
  • Connect the data from service to the UI elements

Before you get started, complete the following hikes:

  1. Import & Launch a Native App
  2. Create UI from Collections
  3. Add Authentication to the App
  4. Creating Services for a Native App
  5. Connect App UI to Data in a Native App
  6. Creating Recipient Details and Delete Feature
  7. Add Create Recipient

Ensure that you open the same project that you have created in the previous hikes.

To open the RecipientsMobApp project, from the main menu, navigate to Project > Open > HCL Reference Architecture > RecipientsMobApp.

When you are ready, click Start!
